item.description:
Hostelling International’s Cultural Café series of fundraising dinners is celebrating Oktoberfest at Jacob Wirth, the famous German bierhaus that has been a Boston institution since 1868. Join us for a night full of lively conversation and hearty German food and drink – all while supporting a great cause!

Time: Tuesday, October 5th, 7-9 PM
Place: Jacob Wirth Restaurant, 31 Stuart Street, Boston, MA 02116
Fee: $30 includes meal, gratuity, and a donation to Cultural Kitchen

Sign up now: http://culturalcafeoc... or offline by contacting Laurine at admin@usahostels.org or at 617-718-7990 ext 10.

You must pre-register for this event – Cultural Cafe events have sold out every time, so don’t miss out!

Established in 1868 and located at its current site since 1878, the Jacob Wirth Restaurant on Stuart Street is the second-oldest restaurant in the city (after the Union Oyster House). Jacob Wirth opened his restaurant shortly after immigrating from Prussia, and his establishment quickly became popular for its bar, featuring a number of Wirth's own brews

More about Cultural Café and Cultural Kitchen:

For over a year, Hostelling International USA’s Cultural Café has been exploring the diverse cultures and cuisines Boston-area restaurants have to offer. Cultural Café is an enjoyable meal shared among fellow members of the community, and also raises funds for Cultural Kitchen, Hostelling International’s program for inner-city youth, as well as other educational and outreach programs and initiatives. For all the latest updates, consider joining the Meetup group at www.meetup.com/culturalcafe.

As an afterschool activity, Cultural Kitchen teaches Boston area youth about culture and diversity using cooking as the primary vehicle - just like travelers at our hostels learn about one another while cooking together in the hostel kitchen. For more information, please visit www.culturalkitchenboston.org
item.how_to_find_us: We will have a Cultural Cafe table.

group.name: Cultural Café - Dine Out for a Cause

item.name: Cultural Cafe - Oktoberfest
